description:
After Eiji dominated Kurenai Rin, a new Order appears, and they`re both taken captive along with Sena! While Rin repeatedly fails to kill Eiji during their escape, Eiji sets out to rescue his sister--and a new group of Orders appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Order! Hashire, Mayou na! Big Examination
Order! Run, Don`t Hesitate! Big Examination
オーダー! 走れ, 迷うな! BIG examination
